但.definition: but; yet; however; still; merely; only; just

但丁.definition: Dante Alighieri (1265-1321), Italian poet, author of the Divine Comedy 神曲

但尼生.definition: Tennyson (name); Alfred Tennyson, 1st Baron Tennyson (1809-1892), English poet

但說無妨.definition: there is no harm in saying what one thinks (idiom)

但願.definition: if only (sth were possible); I wish (that)

但願如此.definition: if only it were so; I hope so (idiom)
